personalInfo: Hello! My name is BarÃ§Ä±n. I'm 24 years old. I graduated from Hacettepe University, Department of Finance. I'm interested in music and painting. I play the flute and piano, and I sing. I've been playing the piano since the beginning of the Corona period. I've started releasing my own songs <3 you can listen on all platforms
streamDescription: Hello! My name is BarÃ§Ä±n. 50% of my streams are live music, and the remaining 50% is spent thanking. Thank you for reading this.
supportMessage: Your support allows me to make a living while realizing my dreams related to music. Since I don't have a job that I can count on as a guarantee to devote time to album projects, every support, big or small, is especially valuable ðŸ’œ

shopierDescription: I create my own song covers, and I send you the story of the songs and the painting, what I experienced and thought during that period, with a special handwritten and sealed letter.
paypalSupport: If you're abroad but want to support me, there's PayPal :)
songListDescription: Click on the photo, send any song you want from the list with your support / subscription of 50 lira or more
